mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum no, b.*, ( select name from member where id = b.writer ) name from ( select * from board order by id) b order by no desc ) b where no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
mapper.insert: insert into board (id, title, content, writer, filename, filepath) values (seq_notice.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
